name: Blood Asylum
description:
A very very short horror game about escaping an Asylum where a insane patient/subject has broken out of its cell.

You have to find the exit and escape!

My 1st game made for the My First Game Jam: Summer 2021
https://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam-summer-2021

I will update the game in the near future, so that it isn't so short, but I released it for now for the game jam.

Controls:
W/A/S/D - movement
E - interact

Warning: Contains blood and some flashing lights, may not be suited for everybody
